thread.title: Pet of the week: Playful 1-year-old shepherd mix pup looking for family to take him home
thread.title_full: Pet of the week: Playful 1-year-old shepherd mix pup looking for family to take him home

author: @utsdmcintosh
title: Pet of the week: Playful 1-year-old shepherd mix pup looking for family to take him home
text: Pet of the week: Playful 1-year-old shepherd mix pup looking for family to take him home A male shepherd mix pup is up for adoption at San Diego Humane Society’s Escondido Campus Animal: Romeo, 1-year-old male shepherd mix; No. 893678. Where: San Diego Humane Society, Escondido Campus, 3500 Burnet Drive. Hours: 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. Tuesdays through Sundays. Adoption fee: $110; includes microchip with lifetime registration, vet exam. Profile: Romeo is playful and full of love. He appreciates gradual introductions to new friends, especially younger children, and will benefit from a family who will put in the effort to build a strong bond with him. More information: (619) 299-7012 or sdhumane.org. Other adoption centers: - Helen Woodward Animal Care Center, 6461 El Apajo Road, Rancho Santa Fe, (858) 756-4117 or animalcenter.org. - Fallbrook Animal Sanctuary, 230 Aviation Road, (760) 685-3533 or fallbrookanimalsanctuary.org - Camp Pendleton Animal Shelter, Building 25132, (760) 725-8120 or petfinder.com/shelters/CA545.html. - San Diego Humane Society, North Campus, 2905 San Luis Rey Road, Oceanside, (619) 299-7012 or sdhumane.org. - San Diego County North Shelter, 2481 Palomar Airport Road, Carlsbad, (760) 438-2312 or sddac.com/north.asp. - Rancho Coastal Humane Society, 389 Requeza St., Encinitas, (760) 753-6413 or sdpets.org. - DirtyLittlePaws Rescue, 3311 Vivienda Circle, Carlsbad (office only), (760) 576-8702 or dirtylittlepaws@gmail.com or petfinder.com/shelters/CA2669.html. - San Diego Humane Society, 5500 Gaines St., San Diego, (619) 299-7012 or sdhumane.org. - San Diego Humane Society, El Cajon Campus, 1275 N. Marshall Ave., (619) 299-7012 or sdhumane.org. - Chula Vista Animal Care Facility, 130 Beyer Way, Chula Vista, (619) 691-5123. - San Diego County South Shelter, 5821 Sweetwater Road, Bonita, (619) 263-7741 or sddac.com/south.asp. Note: This pet might have been adopted before publication.
